alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:35PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Warrick and west central Spencer Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 435 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chandler, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boonville and Folsomville. This includes Interstate 64 in Indiana near Mile Marker 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
